abstract: A man in Jefferson County, Ala., has sued JPMorgan Chase, Morgan Keegan and 10 other banks, advisers and insurers, claiming their work on county bond transactions saddled residents with soaring sewer bills.
lead_paragraph: A man in Jefferson County, Ala., has sued JPMorgan Chase, Morgan Keegan and 10 other banks, advisers and insurers, claiming their work on county bond transactions saddled residents with soaring sewer bills.

headline.main: Big Banks Sued Over Sewer Bonds
